member.name: F:Wechaty.Module.PuppetService.GrpcPuppet._keepAliveTimeoutMs
member.summary: This channel argument controls the amount of time (in milliseconds) the sender of the keepalive ping waits for an acknowledgement. If it does not receive an acknowledgment within this time, it will close the connection.

member.name: F:Wechaty.Module.PuppetService.GrpcPuppet.GRPCReconnectionCount
member.summary: GRPC 重连次数，超过该次数则放弃重连

member.name: M:Wechaty.Module.PuppetService.GrpcPuppet.DiscoverHostieIp(System.String)
member.summary: 发现 hostie gateway 对应的服务是否能能访问
